info.description: This is the API specification for my Planets API
info.title: Planets API

get.summary: Get list of planets visible from a given location, using its ID
get.description: Get a list of the planets visible from a given location by passing its unique ID. Altitude, Azimuth and ordinal direction are included in the response.

parameters.name: t
parameters.description: Date and time of observation (future or past)

get.summary: Get list of planets visible from a given location
get.description: Get a list of planets visible from a given location either using its postcode or latitude and longitude. Lat/Long will be favoured over postcode if both are given.

parameters.name: t
parameters.description: Date and time of observation (future or past)

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Latitude of location to observe from (between -90 and 90)

parameters.name: long
parameters.description: Longitude of location to observe from (between -180 and 180)

parameters.name: postcode
parameters.description: Postcode for location to observe from
